response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $10,000 to me. Considering its immense worth to both us and potential buyers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while also maximizing my return on investment. I look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 9500}
